description: As many as 200,000 people have marched through Brazil's major cities protesting economic imbalances. The Kremlinology of Ben Bernanke. And what Jay-Z’s deal to offer his new album to every new Samsung customer and what it says about the future of music distribution.
teaser: As many as 200,000 people have marched through Brazil's major cities protesting economic imbalances. The Kremlinology of Ben Bernanke. And what Jay-Z’s deal to offer his new album to every new Samsung customer and what it says about the future of music distribution.
byline: Adrienne Hill, D Gorenstein, Stacey Vanek Smith, Gary Duffy, Kai Ryssdal and Sabri Ben-Achour
title: Marketplace for Tuesday, June 18, 2013
